title: Adaptec AVC-1400/1410 GameBridge
description:
Hi,

this is the Adaptec AVC-1400/1410 GameBridge Console-To-PC +TV USB 2.0 Adapter Install CD.

I uploaded this because it seems to be getting very hard to find and thought maybe someone here needed it. This is the full CD, including drivers and software.

NOTES: 
-I personally ripped this from my Adaptec Gamebridge CD. 
-This is 100% genuine and un-modified.
I have now seen this work (sort-of) on win7 64. 
It will also work in windowsxp mode in windows 7.[/code]


TO MAKE WORK ON WINDOWS 7 or 8:
Yes it works after some pre-install tweaking.
You have to go into the install disc and enable compatibility mode for XPsp3 and Run as administrator, for every single exe file in all main and subfolders. 
Reboot and install.




Take this GameBridge AVC-1400 console-to-pc adapter anywhere you want to play games! With the convenient carry case, it easily fits into your pocket. Play your PS2, Xbox 360 and GameCube games right on your PC. Convert those VHS videos and create long lasting VCD archives of all your amazing moments too! 

Record your games in real time! Have you ever wanted to use cheat codes and resurrect that special character from the dead? It is now possible to show others, thanks to the GameBridge AVC-1400! Most of all, don't get stuck with the "expense" of downloading games...Save valuable hard drive space and get peace of mind with your AVC-1400 today!
